long_description: Equipped with a drop-down skeg for enhanced tracking, the Necky Rip 10 is a lively, playful kayak designed to help newer paddlers build skills without sacrificing fun on the water. Sharp keel promotes glide and a moderate rocker makes the boat easy to maneuver. Tough and affordable polyethylene hull provides long-lasting wear and resists UV degradation; molded-in graphics won't peel or fade. Adjustable seat flexes with each paddle stroke, promoting comfort whether you're paddling hard or taking it easy; cup holder keeps a beverage close by. Thigh pads on the coaming offer comfort and control, and generously-sized cockpit allows easy entry and exit. Adjustable foot pedals accommodate different size paddlers. Cross-Lock buckle system on hatch secures cover easily even if you have cold hands; a gasket seals out water and keeps a tight fit. Bungee deck rigging at bow and stern secures extra gear on board; toggle carry handles offer convenient transport of the kayak to and from the water. The Necky Rip 10 Kayak with Skeg weighs 43 lb.
short_description: Equipped with a drop-down skeg for enhanced tracking, the Necky Rip 10 is a lively, playful kayak designed to help newer paddlers build skills without sacrificing fun on the water.
